title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 59 - Minimum Standards For The Form, Content And Sale Of Group And Blanket Insurance Certificates Deemed To Have Been Delivered In This State Pursuant To Section 3201(b) Of The Insurance Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 59 - Minimum Standards For The Form, Content And Sale Of Group And Blanket Insurance Certificates Deemed To Have Been Delivered In This State Pursuant To Section 3201(b) Of The Insurance Law

State Regulations
§ 59.0 - Preamble
§ 59.1 - Definitions
§ 59.2 - Applicability
§ 59.3 - Filing and approval of group insurance certificates delivered after january 1, 1986, where the master contract was delivered prior to january 1, 1986 and the solicitation of new york residents occurs prior to april l, 1986
§ 59.4 - Filing and approval requirements for certificates subject to approval under section 3201(b)(1) of the insurance law, other than those mentioned in section 59.3 of this part
§ 59.5 - Minimum benefit ratio standards
§ 59.6 - Accelerated approval procedure
§ 59.7 - Experience monitoring, reporting and adjustment requirements
§ 59.8 - Severability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. III, subch. A, pt. 59

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 3201, 3217, 3221, 4216, 4235, 4237, art. 43

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
